subject: Baseball
Thyroid Gland
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ spark plug Jose Reyes will probably be back on the roster Saturday at Citi Field, nearly 11 months after he last appeared in a major league game.
snippet: The Mets’ spark plug Jose Reyes will probably be back on the roster Saturday at Citi Field, nearly 11 months after he last appeared in a major league game.
